QuestData.Title: They've Got Us Pinned Down!
QuestData.Description:
These gnoll sharpshooters are ruthless... and surprisingly accurate.
We cannot even consider heading into the Big Tree Hills while they have their weapons trained on us.
Thin our their ranks and show them that we will not be used for target practice!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Hanu at the entrance to Kargpaw's Den in the Big Tree Hills.
